note:
tl;dr: disappointed middle-aged Brit bloke

Member of a species that makes nuclear weapons, withdrawn to a quiet life with a canine. Accidental software tester, instinctive philosopher. Luddite from before it was cool. Ex-subversive, ex-cyclist, ex-lover, redefined by ME/CFS. Focused on making my peace with this unique ball of livingness, Earth, as we decline together.

Humanity has jumped the shark
